alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:33PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bertie and southwestern Chowan Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 133 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Windsor, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Windsor, Colerain, Rockyhock, Valhalla, Cape Colony, Midway, Askewville, Goose Pond, Whites Crossroads, Merry Hill, Mavaton, Edenhouse, Republican, Mount Gould, Hancock, Center Hill, Wakelon, Cisco, Rosemead and Macedonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
